short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatGPT markdown magic is a chrome extension designed to seamlessly copy the output of ChatGPT conversations in markdown format.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ChatGPT markdown magic is a convenient Chrome extension designed to enhance the user experience when interacting with ChatGPT on https://chat.openai.com/. The extension adds a "Copy as Markdown" button to the ChatGPT interface, adjacent to the standard "Copy" button. With a single click, users can copy the ChatGPT generated content as markdown formatted text, making it simple to paste and use the output in various text editors or note-taking applications.

The code is open source and available on https://github.com/mrdotb/chat_gpt_markdown_magic
